modName: Dark Forests of Skyrim - Solstheim Apocalypse
summary: A Landscape overhaul for Solstheim featuring over 100 new types of flora, a mushroom forest, ash desert, and more forested areas.  Billboards available for use with DynDOLOD.  Updated 12/30 with better dead snowy pine textures
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=6]Solstheim Apocalypse

[/size]

[size=3]by mobiusbelmont

[/size]



[youtube]_a9Tc3EDMIo[/youtube]
[size=2]thanks to Jindo Skyrim for this amazing video with wonderful before and after shots[/size][/center][size=5]General Information:[/size]

[list]
[*][size=4]- Adds over 150 new types of trees to the island[/size]
[/list][size=4]
[center][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/993b2d93516f095bffb876a84a1d5e25/tumblr_or9aez5nTf1s2ptqso4_540.jpg[/img][/center]


[/size][list]
[*][size=4]- there is now a giant ash desert with more ash dunes, blowing ash, and no living trees from Attius Farm to Fort Frostmoth.  [/size]
[/list][size=4]
[center][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/b3e7443b8633ece0611afc2e24e3205a/tumblr_or9aez5nTf1s2ptqso7_400.jpg[/img][/center]



[/size][list]
[*][size=4]- A mushroom forest now stretches from the eastern side of Fort Frostmoth to Tel Mithryn.  I’ve added over a hundred mushrooms and some are very BIG[/size]
[/list][size=4]
[center][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/bfe73715623e6473f4887b40a33b62d1/tumblr_or9aez5nTf1s2ptqso6_400.jpg[/img][/center]




[/size][list]
[*][size=4]- The southern part of the island now has smaller flora native to Morrowind. [/size]
[/list][size=4][center][/center]
[center][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/910a85a1b647c2cc8634132a7bebb3cd/tumblr_or9aez5nTf1s2ptqso8_540.jpg[/img][/center]


[/size][list]
[*][size=4]- Middle Solstheim has more trees, both living, ash covered, and dead.[/size]
[/list][size=4]

[center][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/5ee949616f71f2c9ba06820ceae1ae83/tumblr_or9aez5nTf1s2ptqso9_400.jpg[/img][/center]


[/size][list]
[*][size=4]- There is an oasis north of Tel Mithryn with green oaks and flora[/size]
[*][size=4]- ash covered pines and custom trees are now much bigger [/size]
[/list][size=4]
[center][/center][center][/center]

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]- Over 200 pines, dead snowy pines, and living snowy pines have been added to the northern half of the island, returning the northern forests to their glory days of Bloodmoon.[/size]
[*][size=4]Thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13593925]Zhoulia [/url]﻿for the updated and vastly improved textures for the dead snowy pines.  Please drop her an endorsement for her awesome work[/size]
[/list][size=4]
[center][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/1680406e1de8571d15baa09f9234ff2c/tumblr_or9aez5nTf1s2ptqso2_540.jpg[/img]
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/f1c0d8b92deddf2389f97736e540f0e2/tumblr_p1sl0gEPcL1s2ptqso1_540.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]- billboards are available for use with DynDOLOD[/size]
[/list][size=4]

[/size]

[size=6]Compatibility [/size]
[size=4][b]NOT compatible with other landscape overhauls for the island of Solstheim (such as Solstheim Wasteland, Solstheim Landscape Overhaul Dead and Fertile editions, Summer Solstheim, Enhanced Landscapes - Solstheim add ons, Solstheim Genesis, etc)
[/b]

The following mods have been tested and are compatible with Solstheim Apocalypse[/size][list]
[*][size=4]Solstheim extended: [b]Tel Mithryn[/b] and [b]Skaal Village[/b][/size]
[*][b][size=4]Better Tel Mithryn[/size][/b]
[*][size=4]All mods for Skaal Village[/size]
[*][size=4]All mods for Raven Rock[/size]
[*][size=4]All mods that retexture landscape, ash, and objects (like [b]Ash Rocks[/b] and [b]Amidianborn Solstheim[/b][/size]
[*][size=4][b]Skyrim Flora overhaul[/b] and all flora overhauls for Skyrim (as long as they do not overhaul Solstheim by adding trees and static objects, replacers are cool)[/size]
[*][size=4]The Skyrim Flora Overhaul DRAGONBORN option is highly recommended for much better ash textures[/size]
[*][b][size=4]Solstheim The Lost Levels[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]all grass mods[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]all weather mod (THIS MOD DOES NOT ALTER SOLSTHEIM WEATHER)[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Nyhus and the Border of Cyrodiil[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Old Cabin[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Redoran Grove[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Shadow of Morrowind (must generate tree LOD with DynDOLOD or TES5LODGen)[/size][/b]
[*][b][size=4]Teldryn Serious[/size][/b]
[/list]


[size=6]Installation[/size]
[list]
[*][size=4]manual or with mod manager[/size]
[*][size=4]Install the main file, then overwrite with one of the patches if you use Dark Forests of Skyrim and/or Skyrim Flora overhaul[/size]
[*][size=4]NOTE:  patches for aspen mods are not necessary since there are no aspens on Solstheim[/size]
[*][size=4]Performance version coming soon   [/size]
[*][size=4]Billboards and core files available for TREE LOD generation with DynDOLOD or TES5Edit in miscellaneous section [/size]
[*][size=4]If you plan to generate Tree LOD with DynDOLOD or TES5Edit then only install core files plus billboards (no need to install one of the main files)[/size]
[/list][size=4]

Changelog

﻿- version 1.0 = initial release
﻿- version 2.0 =
﻿ ﻿ ﻿- reverted back to vanilla ash trees (now using better textures with SFO Dragonborn)
﻿ ﻿ ﻿- fixed floating trees and misplaced objects
﻿ ﻿ ﻿- billboards and tree LOD significantly improved
﻿ ﻿ ﻿- removed green oaks and replaced with gkb trees 
﻿ ﻿ ﻿- added patch for Dark Forests of Skyrim full version (v 2.7)
﻿ ﻿ ﻿- added grasses to the ash tundra
﻿Update : added missing textures
﻿Update:  added better snowy dead pine textures and normals by Zhoulia
﻿ ﻿

﻿ ﻿[/size]

[size=6]Credits
[/size]
[list]
[*][size=4]Phitt's Sheogorad Resources for plants and mushrooms[/size]
[*][size=4]Zhoulia for the amazing looking dead snowy pine textures and normals[/size]
[*][size=4]Mentha's more colorful trees for some of the colored pines[/size]
[*][size=4]Elenin for hoddminir tree resource[/size]
[*][size=4]GKB for the amazing green tree resource[/size]
[*][size=4]Zilav for the amazing billboard creator[/size]
[/list]
author: mobiusbelmont
